EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations on the Purchase of Your New Home
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Congratulations on the purchase of your new home! As your builder's solar provider, SunPower offers immediate ways to lower your electric bill.
As your builder may have explained, you have a limited window of time to finalize your solar decision. It is important that we speak to you soon so that you can make an informed choice and not miss this opportunity.
A solar advisor called you today. Within the coming days, SunPower will contact you to help you understand how solar works and saves you money.
If you would like to speak with someone immediately, please call our New Home Solar Advisor Team directly at 1.800.268.0331.
Warmly,
Your SunPower Team 1.800.268.0331 www.sunpower.com
